content: k n i t p u m p k i n m a t e r i a l s a b b r e v i a t i o n s co - cast on approximately 40 yds lion brand wool ease st s - stitches thick & quick 1 full ball makes 2 pumpkins round s - round s or equivalent super bulky yarn rs - right side approximately 5 yds contrasting color yarn ws - wrong side size us15/10mm straight or circular k - knit knitting needles p - purl size us9/5 5mm dpns dpn s - double pointed needle s stitch marker polyester fiberfill no gauge finished pumpkin size tapestry needle depends on amount of stuffing sample scissors pumpkin is 6 in wide and 3 5in tall 1 © 2020 adrienne sullivan design k n i t f l a t s t e p 1 s t e p 2 co 37 sts using straight or circular needles row 1 rs k2 p1 across to last st k1 s t e p 3 s t e p 4 row 2 ws p1 then k1 p2 to end of row repeat last two row 11 more times for a total of 24 row s t e p 5 s t e p 6 bind off and cut yarn leaving a 30in long tail fold in half so edges of work are touching right sides out 2 k n i t f l a t s t e p 7 s t e p 8 make an invisible vertical seam down the pull yarn through every other stitch at end of side using tapestry needle to create a tube tube and cinch closed secure with a knot but do not cut yarn s t e p 9 s t e p 1 0 fill open end with polyester fiberfill push tapestry needle with tail yarn through center of closed end through the fiberfill and out the open end s t e p 1 1 s t e p 1 2 weave tail yarn through every other end secure with knot trim yarn and weave stitch and cinch tight both closing the hole in ends and pulling the pumpkin flatter 3 k n i t i n t h e r o u n d s t e p 1 s t e p 2 co 36 sts and join in the round place stitch rnds 1-24 k2 p1 around using the magic marker at beginning of round loop method s t e p 3 s t e p 4 bind off and cut yarn leaving a 30 long tail using tapestry needle pull yarn through every other end st and cinch closed secure with knot but do not cut yarn s t e p 5 s t e p 6 fill open end with polyester fiberfill push tapestry needle with tail yarn through center of closed end through the fiberfill and out the open end 4
